answers.answer: She could certainly have some kidney or even cardiac issues going on.  You really need to get her into the Vet for a thorough exam and get blood work done.  This may help to determine if she is having kidney problems.

Hi. Yes, it could be kidney disease or heart problems ... or diabetes ... or one of many conditions. Your vet needs to diagnose the problem through blood and urine testing, so it can be quickly treated. Don't leave this any longer as some of the conditions we have mentioned can be fatal unless quickly dealt with.Tony

question: my dog is a bosten terrier shes 7 for 3 days she has been drinking alots of water all day an is breathing fast also is uritating alot she is just moping around can anyone help!!!!
title: dottie,sick
